name: that ain't falco
description:
This game isn't finished yet so just beat up a sandbag (with style and sick combos)

CONTROLS:

W- Jump

A/D- Wavedash left/right (grounded), drift left/right (airborne)

S- Pivot (grounded), fast fall (airborne)

J- Up tilt (grounded), dair (airborne)

K- Shine (can cancel shine with a jump, wavedash, or fastfall)

Left/right arrows: Move sandbag with on ground

R- Reset game

(also music is FD from Melee not mine obviously)
